forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High near 10C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High around 50F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 9C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with thunderstorms, especially in the morning. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered showers and thunderstorms, especially early in the day. High 48F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 33F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
